div.head: Hed court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Octauo die mensis Janaurij Anno Dominj Millesimo Quingentesimo
octauo Quo die Sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent

Andreas Watsone
Thomas Dauison
Alexander leitht
Duncan andersoun'
Robertus Dauisone
Willelmus Richardsone
lang Wat in monycabok
Thomas watsone in govlys
Thomas Wodman
Androwe Watsone in cullan
georgius Johnsone
Johnne Watsone in grantuly
Willelmusme bynne
Dauid hay
Willelmus Cusing blakhall
Nicholayus Cusing

Eodem die Accedens ad Barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes
Spens procurator prioris et conuentus Domus fratrum predicatorum dictj
burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu trisdecim
solidorum et quatuor denariorum vsualis monete Scocie dicto loco
a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta olim
Johannis gillespy Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj ex australi
parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Johannis malisone ex occidentali ex vna
et communiones vias regias versus oriens et boream Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringible preter terram et lapides quos Balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Duncano Wandy Roberto reid' et et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Spens
procurator prioris et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum dictj burgi et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj solidorum et octo denariorum monete
Scocie dicto loco a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam Robert club Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
vicj inter terram henricj olim tulideff ex occidentali ex vna et terram Robertj
Waus ex orientali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus boream
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius
processus Testibus Duncano Wandy Roberto reid' et Andrea nauchtie
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collisoun' collector
capellanorum ecclesie sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim solidorum monete vsualis Scocie
dictis capellanis annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de
quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictam burgum in vico Nauium ex
occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram ex australi
ex vna et terram ex boreali partibus ab altera et communionem
viam regiam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides Quos balliuis in Sacculo presentait in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Andrea mortimer Johanne brechin
et Johanne cuk sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram famosus vir Willelmus rolland' burgensis dictj
burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum
vsualis monete Scocie sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore elapso non soluto
de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in futy olim Willelmus lyntone
pertinens inter terram ex boreali ex vna et
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus
testibus Richardo redhed Johanne brechyn et Johanne cuk sergeando

The saide day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis tile Adnrow Waus tile ansuer to
Johnne andersone anent the skath clamyt done to certane pipis of ward' of his

The said' day the prouest bailyeis counsale and' communite grantit thar commone sele
to be set tile ane chartir maid' be ser Johnne prat chaplane of the rud' altar of ane
waist land' to Criste prat in fewferm heretably in takin of thar consent be
caus' thai war patroun of the said' altar

The said day the ballies Continewit the decisioun of the borgh' fundin be thomas meldrum
one Johnne brabnir quhile friday that nixt cumis for waknes' of the court but preiudice
tile ony party

The said' day James Colisoun fforspeakar for Johnne brabnir this assentit to the
continuacioun of the said' borgh' And' protestit for costis skathis dampnis and'
expensis maid' and' Sustenit tharthroue

The pennult day of December the yer forsaid' Katherine Ranisone the relict' of
vmquhile henry lorne oblist hyr hir ayris executouris and' assignez' be the
faithtis of thar bodijs to pay and' deliuer to richerd Waus burges of the
saide his ayris executouris or assignez' ane barrele of grils' full red' and suet
sufficient merchand' gud' of the rychtuis' bind' of abirdene at the fest of mydsomer
nixt hereftir foloving for money thankfully pait

head.add: The graunt of the Salmond' and money to by he led' to theik the kirk and tofallis et cetera

div.p:
The said day the Prouost Bailyeis counsaile and communite vnder writin of thar avin fre
wil and motive to the plesour of god decoring of haly kirk and heile of thar saulis grantit
this salmond' and money vnder writin to by leid' to theik thar body of the kirk and tofallis et cetera
gilbert menyheis Prouost iij barrelis of salmond' ser Johne ruthirfurd ij barrel salmond'
James colisoun ij barrelis salmond' Johne of mar iij barrelis salmond' thomas leslie j barrel salmond'
Patry leslie ij barrel salmond' Duncan colisone j barrel salmond' Thomas Wod j barrel salmond'
Thomas Waus j barrel salmond' Johne colisone ij barrel salmond' Alexander gray ane barrel of
salmond' Dauid steuart j barrel salmond' patry rede ane franche crovne Williame futhes
j barrel salmond alexander malisone j barrel salmond William portar j barrel salmond' thomas vatson
v s' Dauid kintor j barrel salmond Johne Kintor vj s' viij d' Dauid errol x s' Johne
andersone demy barrel salmond Androue lousone vij s' Androw futhes ij s' Johnne of murray
tulidef x s' Johne murray in vico castri demy salmond' androw stevin sone v s' Robert
crag j barrel salmond William murray x s' Dauid murray and his fadir j barrel salmond Androw
burnat v s' Johne' crak v s' Malcolme crag xiiij s' patry gordoun v s' Johnne
blak ane barrel salmond William laysk v s' gavane murray half j barrel of grils Johne arthour
j barrel salmond Dauid fynne xvij s' Dauid straloche x s' Dauid lame v s' mathoue
branche j barrel grils' patry chernsid j barrel salmond Duncan fyf demy barrel of salmond or the
vail of thaim Johne cullan ij barrel salmond richard Wandy demy barrel salmond Duncan
craik demy barrelis salmond thomas menyeis demy salmond alexander nory vj s' viij d' Niniane
blinseile viij s' henry rede demy barrel g' Alexander King iiij s' alexander bannerman in bog
farlow v s' Androw barkar x s' Alexander Kintor demy salmond' Johne andirsone
Junior v s' Duncan gilrutht v s' Johne quhithors' iij s' Androw grig iij s' Johne
litstar eldar iij s' thomas meldrum ix s' Richard Wricht viij dais laubour robert
morys' iij s' Alexander roche v s' Johne meldrum v s' Dauid bannerman ij s' Alexander buk iij s'
William blinseile coupar v s' Dauid coupar v s' Johne brakanche iij s' alexander fraser
iij s' Robert moir iij s' patry leslie yongar v s' Johne Watsone iij s' Androw
portar iij s' Johne wscheart xvj d; Johne flessar iij s' Richard' redhed v s'
Thomas lammytnone vj s' Duncan Wandy vj s' Alexander morymar ij s' Johne
frostar v s' Johne loremar v s' Dauid treis ij Inglis grotis Alexander
Donaldsone ij s' Androw smyth iij s' Johne bawgerscho xvj d' William Watson
iij s' gilbert litster x s' Androw edindeoch ij s' robert Joffray iij s' Androw brabnir v s'
James goulat x s' Androwe stratoun xiiij s' alexander tulideff iiij s' Johne
riche iiij s' Crysty prat xs' Alexander horne vs' Robert pipar iiij s'
Williame stile iiij s' robert red v s' Adam Wer' x s' Androw gordoun mercator
iiij s' Alexander brabnir ij s' alexander moresone iij s' gilbert tailyeour ij s'
Alexnader tailyeour iij s' philp of Kelly v s' William King ij s' Syme
of Ellone vj s' viij d' Johne mar iij dys' iiij s' Dauid Crysty iiij s'
Johne brabnir v s' Duncan portar iiij s' Nichol baxtar v s' Dauid strathachin
vij s' thomas laysk x s' Willaim andirsone ii s' Dauid andirsone vij s'
William rolland' demy barrel salmond Androw litstar xiiij s' James strathachin
v s' Robert hile x s' Johne crag x s' William Wormet j barrel g' thomas
Craufurd x s' Dayud andirsone j barrel of salmond Dauid Mar eldar demy barrel of gryls
the four officiaris j barrel salmond' Johne fynne xvj d' William Abirdour
Johane fechat yongar v s' patry Arthour v s' cutberd Johnsone
the lard of wardris ij barrel fo salmond' Androw cullan ij barrel salmond'

The said day Johnne of meldrum oblist him be the fath of his bodie to consent and pay
tile Androwe stratoun xl s' at the fest of candilmes' nixt hereftir folowing but
ony langir delay fraude or gill In presence of thomas Waus bailye
Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xijo die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Johnne andirsone with master alexander lausone his forspekar folowit and
persewit androw Waus be strintht of ane borgh' for the wranguis' skathing and veting
of vij pipis of wade quhen his schip fel oure in the hawyne of the wer' in
falt of keping' and' wet the said waide Ande for the skath of Ilkane pip
extending to v li' quhilk borgh' the said androw with gilbert menyeis his for/
spekar denyit Ande Incontinent with consent and' assent of bath the said partiis
the said borgh' was put to the decisioun of ane assis' of thir personis vndir
writin that is to say Johne of cullan Johne colisone James colisone Johnne of mar
Robert crag' Dauid steuart Johnne arthour Johnne of murray alexander malysone
Criste prat malcome crag William murray patry chernsid' Duncan fyf
Johne of Kintor Dauid Kintor and' Dauid straloche burges of the said'
burgh' quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aitht Suorne witnes and' preyvis
rychtis resonis ande allegaconis of bath the said partiis producit hard sene and vndir/
standin fand ande deliuerit ale in ane voce concordand' the said borgh'
of nain availe and' the said androw quyt of the weting and spilling of the
said vij pipis of wade and ale skath done to thame for the quhilkis the said'
Johne was in ane amerciament of the court and the said androw quyt of his
clame and challance of the said vij pipis of wad and that was gevin for dome

The saide day Alexander buk was conuict' be his avne toung grant for the
forstalling of the burghe in bying of Skinnis wole and hidis et cetera and was extentit
to xxtj s'

The saide day Dauid bannerman was conuict' for forstalling of the burghe in bying
of Skinnis et cetera and was extent to vj s' viij d'

The saide day Sandy tulidef was conuict' be his avne tong grant
for forstalling of the burghe' in skinnis and hidis et cetera and was extentit to x s'

The saide day Jonhne Riche was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Cullane forspekar for forstalling of the burghe in bying hidis wole and skinnis
and extentit to pay xviij s'

The saide day William laysk was conuict' be ane assis' for forstalling of the
burghe' in lying of wol hidis and skinnis and extentit to vj s' viii d'

The saide day William blakhale of that Ilk was conuict' be his avne tounge
grant for forstalling of the burghe in byng of wole hidis and Skinnis and extentit
to xx s'

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais tile Dauid
andirsone tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be richerd Wricht for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xl s' wark for his wark and' xlviij
s' for his expens'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis Januarij anno quo
Supra

The saide day Robert Wat was accusit for trubulance of Johne mathesone in his
hous' And for trubulance of him in the sey Ande for tribulance of gelis monrowe
his seruand And the saide Johne was accusit for tribulance of the said Robert
Ande the said gelys for tribulance of the said Robert et cetera quhilkis was denyit
be al the said partiis et cetera Ande thareftir the said Actionis being at ane assis'
with consent of bath the said partiis was continevit to friday that nixt cumis

Eodem die patricius rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes mathesone et famuli suj
erunt Indempns pro Roberto Wat aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes mar' deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus Robertus et sui famuli erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam
Juris et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum suo plegio de huismodi fideiussione

The saide day Jonhne crag come dettour to pay to Dauid futhes ane barrele of flouris
at his nixt hayme Cumyne he payand to him the fraucht of the said barrele for
peter Waus mastir of ane Schip callit the cristofore of Deipe

The said' day William Wormet patry Rede and Androw gordone grauntit to pay the
Skippar and mastir thar' fraucht and ladyn'

The saide day the prouest and balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to Johne
Andirsone tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin be marione quhit for the Rele
ving of the annuell of the land that scho Is parcionare of It and discernit the
copy of the borghe' to the saide Johne

The saide day Jonhne andirsone burges of the said burghe askit and requirit mal/
come crag burges of the said burghe' as factour' and procurator to Clays Spyne
the Some of xlij pundis and xiiij s' ande the saide malcome denyit that he
awthe ony Siluer to the said' Clays' nor' hed' nay Siluer of his

The said' day the balyeis ordanit ane officiar' to warne thomas chamer
to comper one friday that next Cumis tile ansuer tile Alexander horne for the
wranguis' hiddin fra him of ane barrel of tar'

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that nex Cumis to henry Rede tile
ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Robert morisone for the wranguis' haldin fra
him of the fracht of ane comptour and vthir gudis et cetera and discernit him the Copy of the said' borghe

The said' day Dauid Kintor allegit Alexander malysone to haue him ane
condicioun' that he suld' haue his thridpart fischingis of ane nethtis of the
wattir of Done siclik wys' as he hed' his thridpartis fischingis of the said'
watter' this yer' bigane quhilk he Offerit him to preiwe And the
balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to the said' Dauid to preiwe
his said' allegiance
Andreas grig, Alexander Roche - amerciantur in defectu presencie

The saide day thomas leslie Norman leslie and Androw balcromy Oblist
thame be the fathtis of thar' bodiis coniunctlie and Seueralie in the
stratast Stile of Obligacioun' Renuncande ale benefice benefice of
diuisione to content and pay tile ane honorabile mane gilbert menyeis
prouest of the saide burghe' fyfti nyne Schillingis

Cristofer prat thomas chamer henry reid Dauid Kintor Johnne' of Murray
Robert hill alexander malisone Johnne andirsone Androu barkar Johnne of
crag James strathachin and alexander Nory burges of the said burgh'
suorne in ane assis' Quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aitht suorinn'
the richtis Ressonis and allegacionis of baitht the said partijs herd sene and'
vndirstandin fand' and deliuerit ale in ane voice concordand' the said tennentis
and takismen of the raik quyt of ale wrang' in the fischingis at the said
placis
